summary: THE DRIVER'S SIDE 'DOOR AJAR' LIGHT AND CHIME GO OFF WHEN THE DOOR IS CORRECTLY SHUT. THE DOORS WILL NOT LOCK. IF LEFT TO RING IT WILL DRAIN THE BATTERY BECAUSE INTERIOR LIGHTS WILL NOT TURN OFF. IT IS NECESSARY TO STOP CAR, PUT INTO PARK, AND SLAM THE DOOR MULTIPLE TIMES. IT HAPPENS EVERYTIME THE DOOR MUST BE SHUT.
